word:
Last night I had quite an experience. The captain told me I should have the porthole open in my berth on lower deck. I heard something I cannot describe. I sprang up and said, "What is that, Edith [Donaldson]?" But the words were scarcely spoken when a stream of water rushed into my berth. I called the steward and he set things in order. . . . He closed the porthole, and thus ended the fresh air I was to have in my stateroom. . . . 


                                   -183-
